biotools.summary:
Integrated assembly of phenotype-specific transcripts from multiple RNA-seq profiles.

IntAPT is a C++ package to identify alternatively spliced isoforms using multiple RNA-seq data. The user manual of IntAPT is available here. We have provided both precompiled binaries (require gcc 5.4.0 or newer) and source code.

bioschemas.name: IntAPT
